definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax

sentences.english: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet .
sentences.chinese: 合同中有一條款禁止承租人轉租房屋。

sentences.english: Why Should Landlords Require Tenants to Have Renter's Insurance?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要房東要求租戶有承租人的保險？。

sentences.english: Tenant farmers grow mushrooms on the hillsides.
sentences.chinese: 承租人在山坡地種香菇。

sentences.english: Secondly, the author studies the lessee's right to claim.
sentences.chinese: 其次，研究承租人的索賠權問題。

sentences.english: A lending contact is an agreement between a lessor and a lessee.
sentences.chinese: 租賃契約是出租人和承租人之間達成的租用協議。

sentences.english: Obviously, it organizes leasing packages for lessors and lessees.
sentences.chinese: 顧名思義，它的工作就是爲出租人和承租人牽線搭橋。

sentences.english: Are you the owner, lessee, tenant or contractor?
sentences.chinese: 閣下是否物主，承租人，住客或承辨人？

sentences.english: The ownership of the leased asset is transferred to the lessee when the term of lease expires;
sentences.chinese: 在租賃期屆滿時，租賃資產的所有權轉移給承租人。

sentences.english: Sublessee hereby agrees to accept possession of the Subleased Premises on an "AS IS" basis.
sentences.chinese: 轉租承租人在此同意按“現狀”驗收和入住轉租物業。

sentences.english: The  tenant is  discontented with the  content of the agreement for  renting the tennis  tent.
sentences.chinese: 承租人對租用網球帳篷的協議內容不滿。

sentences.english: While in possession of the lease item, the lessee shall perform the obligations of maintenance and repair thereof.
sentences.chinese: 承租人應當履行佔有租賃物期間的維修義務。

sentences.english: Where the shipowner acts against the provisions of the preceding paragraph, the charterer is entitled to cancel the charter.
sentences.chinese: 出租人違反前款規定的，承租人有權解除合同。

sentences.english: Rent contract is a agreement between the lessor and the lessee.
sentences.chinese: 租賃契約是出租人和承租人之間達成的租用協議。

sentences.english: Owners commenced arbitration proceedings asserting that Charterers were not entitled to make the deduction.
sentences.chinese: 船東提起仲裁，認爲承租人沒有權利扣除運費。

sentences.english: Article 140 The charterer shall pay the hire as agreed upon in the charter.
sentences.chinese: 第一百四十條承租人應當按照合同約定支付租金。

sentences.english: There was no evidence that charterers first notice was not honestly given.
sentences.chinese: 沒有證據證明承租人的第一次通知違反了誠實原則。

definition: borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
